relevant_findings.general: Jaundiced, alert, oriented, no acute distress
relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclera icteric, MMM, oropharynx clear, EOMI, PERRL, neck supple, JVP not elevated, no LAD
relevant_findings.CV: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 + S2, systolic murmur best heard at ___, no rubs or gallops
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, rhonchi
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, TTP over LUQ and epigastrium but worse over RUQ, hyperactive BS
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, well perfused, 2+ pulses, no clubbing, cyanosis or edema
relevant_findings.neuro: CNII-XII intact, strength upper/lower extremities, grossly normal sensation, 2+ reflexes bilaterally, gait deferred
